name: Starting The Game
description:
Starting the Game is a game about a non-experienced end user who is trying to download and play a game.

List of features:

  • Fully narrated by a native English speaker
  • Steam achievements
  • Gaming/tech/IT memes
  • Simulation of various OS's
  • Terrible design

Can you survive being a computer newbie and will you actually get to play a game?
Let's see...
